NAME: Health Potion
DESCRIPTION: Restores vitality and heals wounds

NAME: Strength Elixir
DESCRIPTION: Enhances physical power and boosts attack

NAME: Protection Scroll
DESCRIPTION: Increases defensive capabilities

NAME: Agility Tonic
DESCRIPTION: Boosts speed and agility for swift movements

NAME: Resistance Salve
DESCRIPTION: Provides resistance against elemental damage

NAME: Focus Crystal
DESCRIPTION: Sharpens concentration and improves accuracy

NAME: Energy Drink
DESCRIPTION: Replenishes energy and increases stamina

NAME: Fortitude Potion
DESCRIPTION: Enhances endurance and grants extra health

NAME: Vigor Elixir
DESCRIPTION: Revitalizes and boosts overall physical performance

NAME: Guardian Amulet
DESCRIPTION: Provides a protective aura and improves defense

NAME: Mana Potion
DESCRIPTION: Restores magical energy for spellcasting

NAME: Blaze Scroll
DESCRIPTION: Unleashes a fiery blast to engulf enemies

NAME: Shadow Essence
DESCRIPTION: Allows temporary invisibility and stealth

NAME: Frost Shard
DESCRIPTION: Chills enemies and slows down their movements

NAME: Enchanted Feather
DESCRIPTION: Grants the ability to levitate and fly briefly

NAME: Swift Potion
DESCRIPTION: Enhances speed and grants quick reflexes

NAME: Elemental Charm
DESCRIPTION: Amplifies elemental powers and spell damage

NAME: Deflection Crystal
DESCRIPTION: Creates a protective barrier against incoming attacks

NAME: Phantom Elixir
DESCRIPTION: Allows temporary intangibility and ethereal movement

NAME: Willpower Tonic
DESCRIPTION: Boosts mental focus and resistance to magic

NAME: Arcane Elixir
DESCRIPTION: Unleashes a surge of magical power and increases spell potency

NAME: Holy Water
DESCRIPTION: Purifies and banishes dark forces

NAME: Storm Orb
DESCRIPTION: Summons lightning bolts to strike enemies

NAME: Divine Shield
DESCRIPTION: Creates an impenetrable barrier against all harm

NAME: Celestial Feather
DESCRIPTION: Grants divine flight and angelic protection

NAME: Elixir of Eternal Life
DESCRIPTION: Grants immortality and eternal youth

NAME: Forbidden Grimoire
DESCRIPTION: Unleashes forbidden spells with immense power

NAME: Dragon Scale Armor
DESCRIPTION: Armor crafted from the scales of a mighty dragon

NAME: Soulstone
DESCRIPTION: Stores captured souls to enhance magical abilities

NAME: Astral Cloak
DESCRIPTION: Wraps the wearer in the fabric of the cosmos

NAME: Infinity Elixir
DESCRIPTION: Unlocks limitless potential and transcends mortal limitations

DESCRIPTION: Ancient artifact that controls the flow of time

DESCRIPTION: Contains the ancient knowledge of the ages
